key.name: W
key.desc: Weigh-off to neutral buoyancy. (Takes about 10 seconds and only works on ground.)

key.name: E
key.desc: Release one quick release ballast bag fore.

key.name: D
key.desc: Release one quick release ballast bag aft.

key.name: R
key.desc: Switch the direction of the selected engines.

key.name: Y
key.desc: Release mooring mast connection or wire.

key.name: U
key.desc: Attach mooring wire. Only possible within 200 meters of the mooring mast.

key.name: w
key.desc: Walk view: walk forward, +shift to run.

key.name: a
key.desc: Walk view: side step left, +shift to run.

key.name: d
key.desc: Walk view: side step right, +shift to run.
